did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: International Brotherhood Pulp, Sulphite, Paper Mill Workers, Local 670 (Utica, NY) Minute Book, 1956-1968

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: International Brotherhood Pulp, Sulphite, Paper Mill Workers, Local 670

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minute book of the International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers, Local 670 from Utica, N.Y.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Local 670 of the International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers was based in Utica, New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the minute book of the International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers, Local 670 from Utica, N.Y., beginning in February 1956 and ending in February 1968.

controlaccess.corpname: International Brotherhood of Pulp, Sulphite, and Paper Mill Workers. Local 670 (Utica, N.Y.)
